name: Pihop-pi
bossDescription: A giant frog with a very full bladder.
roomDescription: There are 10 platforms in the room, numbered 0 through 9

attackBehaviors.name: pee
attackBehaviors.actionDescription: Pihop-pi just peed all over the floor.
attackBehaviors.avoidDescription: But you jumped to avoid it.

vulnerableBehavior.name: hop on platforms
vulnerableBehavior.solutionBehaviorIndication: One of the platforms starts glowing
